headline: Dow leaps 585 points as US stocks win back most of Friday's wipeout
summary: U.S. stocks rallied on Monday and won back most of their sharp loss from last week, when worries about how President Donald Trump’s tariffs  may be punishing the economy  sent a shudder through Wall Street.  Idexx Laboratories helped lead the way and soared 27.5% after the seller of veterinary instruments and other health care products reported a stronger profit for the spring than analysts expected.  The pressure is on U.S. companies to deliver bigger profits after their stock prices shot to record after record recently.

content.title: Dow leaps 585 points as US stocks win back most of Friday's wipeout
content.summary: U.S. stocks rallied on Monday and won back most of their sharp loss from last week, when worries about how President Donald Trump’s tariffs  may be punishing the economy  sent a shudder through Wall Street.  Idexx Laboratories helped lead the way and soared 27.5% after the seller of veterinary instruments and other health care products reported a stronger profit for the spring than analysts expected.  The pressure is on U.S. companies to deliver bigger profits after their stock prices shot to record after record recently.

thumbnail.caption: Traders works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange, Friday, Aug. 1, 2025, in New York. (AP Photo/Yuki Iwamura)
